# No Bias Decay
- No [Learning Rate Decay tricks](Learning%20Rate%20Decay%20tricks.qmd)
- Equivalent to [Lp Regularization](Lp%20Regularization.qmd) L2 to all parameters to drive the values towards 0
- Only apply [Regularization](Regularization.qmd) to the weights
- Leave [Batch Normalization](Batch%20Normalization.qmd) [Layers](Layers.qmd) alone
- [LARS](LARS)
